title: Real-Life Integrated Basic Chemistry Online Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners lack awareness of how chemical knowledge applies to daily life and work, while being accustomed to media content consumption via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can explain everyday chemical phenomena (e.g., food preservation, cleaning agent reactions) with an accuracy of 85% or higher.
Learners produce three mobile-optimized videos under 3 minutes, visually narrating real-life applications of chemical concepts through storytelling
Learners achieve at least 4 points (on a 5-point scale) in scientific validity and creativity criteria for submitted project outcomes via peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
